title: Before Unbound, Laurens ten Dam and Thomas Dekker Spent the Night in an Oklahoma Jail
content:
The Dutchmen were arrested for indecent exposure after getting changed in the parking lot of a Mexican restaurant.

Read the full article at Before Unbound, Laurens ten Dam and Thomas Dekker Spent the Night in an Oklahoma Jail on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
